name: Door XP
description:
The jam version is out! Don't hesitate to vote and follow me as I intend to make updates. Please enjoy! The theme was "Out of control".

What is to come ?

I'll keep working on the game until the votes end. Here's what I wish add :

New ennemies
  • Faster
  • Stronger (need two anti virus to die)
  • Clever (use the shortest path)
New traps
  • Storage place, that you can remove (rm command) killing every virus inside.
  • Moving Anti Virus that you can order to move via commands.
  • Bus roads, that stops Virus from moving while activated.
New Levels ! Better SFX/FX and feedback
